title: Emerging Markets Sour Amid Metals Selloff and Dollar Strength
description: Emerging-market assets pared a monthly rally, falling for a second session after a massive selloff in metals and renewed dollar strength dampened risk appetite on Friday.
content: Emerging-market assets pared a monthly rally, falling for a second session after a massive selloff in metals and renewed dollar strength dampened risk appetite on Friday.
